Articles.Content:
Have a few mods; but the game locks up while loading.  Loading bar goes up to 50% and says "Progress Text" and goes no further.  Have looked; but have been playing 1.1.3 until 1.2 mods were available.

Edited October 18, 2016 by Fr8monkey
stupid question, but are you running from the 32 or 64 bit exe?
Tried both; but both hang up at the same point.  All my mods are from CKAN...
Are all the mods and module manager the 1.2 versions? Can you supply a mod list and log file.
I fixed it.  Deleted all content, reloaded and then reloaded mods.  Thanks.
